content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: 4/1/2015 @ 1230hrs  i went out side with my infrared binaculars to see if i could see any wildlife in the woods behind the apts and then to see the milkyway,  i noticed a reddish shine on the grass like a reflection from above.  i looked up and saw this very red object.  i tried to look at it with the infrared but it was to bright so i went into the house and got my video camera and started tapping.  the object was a very bright red and it was hovering just below the clouds and when it moved a very bright green light game out of it the same size as the red light.  i had a hard time videoing it as i had to hold on the balcony so i would not fall off as i was hanging from it so i could get most of it filmed at then it just shot off.
content.summary: Steady blood red light,  then very bright green light left on object,to move, then green light stop, until it moved again

content.detailedDescription:
Sorry for any mistakes in the content, as english is not my first language.

this was my very first sighting of any kind. i had experienced some weird situations or events in the 

past but in terms of seeing anything unsual or weird outdoors, this is was the first time.

i saw an orb of brigh light in the air outdoors (but not in the sky or closer to it) at the end of san 

luis street in the city of faro, algarve, portugal. it was on a monday, 15th september of 2014 at 8:30 

pm from this coordinates (37.024195, -7.923251). i saw it flying around 10/11 meters in hight from the 

ground and it was like 20/30 meters away from me in distance. it just crossed the street i was walkin 

in, from the right to the left, in a perfect horinzontal straigh line trajetory or path (about like 5 

meters) at a very slow velocity (around 10km/h), like the velocity of a bike going slow. it was just 

seen for a few seconds, 3 to maybe 5 and of a sudden it was gone, not leaving any trail. i did't see it 

shrink, it just went out of my sight of sudden, just like when someone turn off the light in a room. 

you dont see it shrink or the light bulb going away, it just simply goes out of sight. that's what 

happen, just after when i saw just for a few seconds. the 'orb' was a circle of light perfectly round 

with about 5, 6 cm in diameter (without any kind of sparks around it), it had a brigh white light very 

intense, of just one color, and didn't leave any trail.

in faro city, it wasnt dark already. it was that dark blue just before it goes black so i could still 

see the buildings, houses and the sky perfectly. i was walking on the street on my way home (i dont do 

it very often, just from time to time, i go for a walk to some place and then return home) and usually 

i walk lookin down to see where i step in, and of a sudden something made me to look and raise my head, 

not to the front, but up because i realised that something bright was flying just a few meters away 

from me. it was an automatic and instinctive behavior. the street where it happens has houses (1st 

floor) of both sides and whatever that crossed that night it just passed over just a few meters in 

hight above the roofs/balconys of the houses. there was nobody else in street and there was no cars 

driving by either on that moment.

i confessed that i never whitness anything like it, but right in the moment we think that it is 

somthing caused by our eyes or our tired head. but truth is, i saw it and follow its movement for 

around seconds and of a suden it was gone. it wasnt any kind of flying entertainment instrument/toy 

that i would have known of. and i discard aswell any kind of soap bubble lightened by the streets 

lamps. by the informations of the distances and hights already mentioned, the chance of being any kind 

of plane, helicopter, satelite, chinese flahslight, led ballon, laser, meteorite or star is definetly 

out of question in my mind. there was no possibility of recording due to its brief appearance.

i can reveal that for my own experience that during the sighting and in a fraction of seconds, the mind 

tries incessantly for an answer for whatever the eye is seeing but after exclusion after exclusion (is 

not a ballon, not a bug, not a toy, not a lantern, not a laser, etc), when the phenomen just stops, the 

mind become even further and more perplexed than when it just faced with the problem. simply because, 

all plausible assumptions (that the mind got in its database) were simply set aside. the mind couldn't 

coincide or make sense, whatever it was, with absolutly anything that i have seen live or making part 

of our known and 'apparent' world or physical reality.

right after the sighting, i tried to memorize in my mind the 'visual image' of what i just whitnessed 

and being just 2 minutes away from home walkin, i was already thinkin what kind of device or phenomenon 

 could resemble such thing, in order to search on internet when i get home. just before thinkin of a 

paranormal possibility, i though first to certify if there was actually nowdays any kind of toy or 

'drone' ressembling what i saw. of course that my eyes, knew what they saw and perfectly knew that it 

was not toy but my rational mind wanted by all means to find an explanation for it. cause one thing is 

to see those whitish circles in pics (those typical called 'orb's of dust that show on photographs), 

another is to whitness with your own eyes a circle of light passing just through your eyes not too far 

away. i knew it would be probably very dificult of find something similar in video on internet, cause i 

had the true belief that that thing wasnt a device/toy.

although i was unable to capture it on video, to my big surprise when i arrived home, i simply digited 

on my pc 'bright orb' and on a video search, i could found exactly what i was lookin for, exactly what 

i saw. i couldnt believe my eyes. after all, that circle of light outdoors minutes ago, wasnt a product 

of my mind, it wasny my eyes playing tricks on me. if this thing is captured on video, therefore it 

wasnt an alucination i just had. whatever it was, it happened and i saw it. gezzz, iam not crazy. (i 

thought, ;)

its important to say that i never across or saw in my entire life these type of light orbs in any 

videos. for sure ive seen ufo docs through the years on tv but never came across to these type of light 

balls in any videos. ufos to me were synonymous of 'flying metal machines', those flying saucer crafts 

drive by those little aliens creatures so usually portrayed in such docs or movies. these type of 

'light orb' thing i never saw it on tv or any media, it it was the case, i would for sure would have it 

recognise in the first place in street. it was simpy the most weird thing ever i just saw in my entire 

life. it was just for a few seconds but it made me very interested to find out what on earth was that.

i'll leave though some links found on internet that shows in a very accurately way, what i just 

whitness in faro (city), but in faro it was seen with a much lower altitude than what its shown in the 

videos.

i confessed that when i first saw it, i really though it was something psychic or illusory (cause i 

just came from hospital that night from a visit and my mind could be, who knows, a bit tired). but 

could my eyes created all of that? fact is, that later as i mentioned, i searched for it on internet 

and i find and see the same 'orbs' in videos already taped by other people and realise that this is 

apparently a phenomenon that is already happening at a worldwide level for so many years already.

whether or not these videos are real, all i can say is that they're truly similar to what i saw, and as 

i mentioned, i didn't have any knowledge about the balls of light in video whatsoever, and specially in 

such particular and unsual way, just right in the middle of the street or sky. ive never experienced so 

far nothing of the genus, so iam still considering to which point this phenomenon is real or common 

either in portugal or in any other places of the world. and iam not talking about a tiny luminous dot 

flying above my head just like a plane or something similar.

a circle of light with 5/6cm in diameter (size of a tenis ball) just crossed and appeared in front of 

me at 10 meters hight (about the size of an apartment with 3,4 floors cause thats what mine has), just 

a few meters away from me in the middle of the street, without making any sound. it didnt look 

spherical, it didnt had an spherical format, it look like a plane circle, because it was only from one 

tone of light, without any shadows, therefor without any tridimensional appearance. but it was a tone 

of light so strong that i dont remember seeing anything like it, and as strange and weird as it seems, 

it was perfectly definite. i could only compare the intensity of light to the scoocer/football stadium 

lights, but if you try to look at them, we can barely look at, cause we get to see all the reflections 

and sparks shoting in all directions. it wasnt the case with the orb. though it was very very bright, i 

could stare at it for a millions years if it let me, it didnt hurt or blinded my eyes as a car's light 

would, though the light of the 'orb' was very very powerful.

personaly i dont have a big belief of the existence of extraterrestial lifes/beings similar to ours, in 

which some kind of other humanoids races come to visit us or to spy us but after what i jsut saw, i 

dont discard the possibility of the existence of another type of existences or energeitc 

entities/organisms to which we are not awake for or have knowledge.



these are some videos i found (not mine), note that the light color shown on the videos is nothing like 

in real life. the 'orb' is like 100x brighter than it shows on video:

1º italy - at minute '40:18' (the one flying behind the trees): - 
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

2º - [link moved to fi section/cms/tg]





i'll leave aswell a pic from google maps poiting the place of my sighting:

best regards
content.summary: Bright circle'orb' flying very slow and very low - portugal (faro) - 15/09/2014

content.detailedDescription:
I am guessing on the date july 2007 i could be off a year or more. my wife gave me the date not sure why women can remember dates like that? 

i would sometimes sleep in the basement at our house.  we had heated floors which were nice in the winter and it was cooler in the summer.  the couch was under a big window on north side that you could look up and see the sky and trees bordering our land to the west, 50 yrds from window.  big oaks 100 feet tall, i would think. it was very early and light out. i think 5am-6am.  i was in a deep-deep sleep, the type where it feels like you have to crawl out of a hole to get on top. usually reasons to wake from a sleep like that is you have to pee or someone is waking you.  as i was coming out of this my eyes were open.  the object i saw was huge. i could not see any edges. i could not see the sides or top.  it was dark in color dark brown almost black. huge square/rectangle objects filled the area.   they were of all different sizes.  like a city upside down. it looked like the corners were somewhat worn with a shade of color difference maybe rust. it was moving very slow but of its size it could had been cruising fast.  i would say 20mph.  it was moving right(east) to left(west) of my window.  i could not see if it was casting a shadow that side of the house was the shade side.  as i was waking up more and more it was cloaking in and out until it completely disappeared.  i knew it was still there but stayed on the couch.  i didn't want to give up my position and possibly turn up missing.  my cellphone laid next to me on the floor but i didn't want to take my eyes off it.  plus it was a old phone that i would have had to search for the camera.  as this was all going on, my mind was thinking they aren't cloaking the machine they are controlling my brain.  no wonder people with mental issues or drugged see strange things?  i was awake the rest of the day and only told my best friend and wife not even my son.  i feel this was not a dream  i don't have any dreams that i can recall so much information or vision in my head like this.  it's a memory.
content.summary: Huge cloaking ufo in stacy mn

content.detailedDescription: A little background about me is that i am 21 years old, married for over 2 years now, recently had a newborn son, and live in a small rural community where i commute back and forth to be an accountant in a larger community.. seems pretty normal! well i was doing some training for work and had to go to pittsburgh (march 16, 2015 until march 22, 2015). as i was flying from pittsburgh to my layover in minneapolis, it was early morning and the sun was just rising. on the north side of the plane there was a slight chatter behind me and i did hear a couple asking what that was, and look over there, before long i had someone leaning over to look out my window and checking it out. there were 3 distant objects.. which i personally at the time believed were just other planes.. but they were close to one another and moving at a much faster rate than we were. for a few brief moments they actually were moving sporadically in multiple directions, there were not any visible lights or distinct shapes other than they seemed to be like a stealth bomber shape, it was in the distance quite a ways, but there is nothing out there that should be able to move suddenly up and down, or even be able to fly easily 4 to 5 times faster than we were travelling forwards then all of a sudden do the same things backwards, upwards, and/or downwards. i could see that 2 of the objects were a bit lighter than the other, but all 3 were like a matte kind of black or grey. it definitely opened my mind some and i know there were other passengers taking pictures, but i have a picture but only 1 of the objects can be seen and by the time i went to video it, they seemed to have dropped below the clouds over what would be the great lakes. also it was a delta airlines flight, not sure if that matters but if any one else reports something similar then if it were delta it could be the same experience. also the time may be eastern or central, not sure 100% which time zone i was in.
content.summary: Midflight and seen 3 objects to the north over the great lakes area.

content.detailedDescription: We were on the a road called devils rd it's more like a valley and we were driving and i was looking out the window and see like these 4 lights in the sky and 2 were flashing it was like a diamond triangle shape and as we're looking it was like 10 mins we seen this and the lights stopped flashing and got really bright and then slowly vanished
content.summary: It didn't last long but you could obviously see it wasn't a plane or anything you have seen before

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on the bolconey of the hard rock hotel at 11:58 pm, saw 4 red/orange objects in wedge formation. they where the size of an asprain travling south to north. i told my dad who was also sitting with me, who is a retired msgt from the usaf. he could not make out what it was either but was surprised by the high rate of speed. lost sight of them after they when over the building.
content.summary: On vacation, witnessed 4 red/orange orbs travling high rate of speed from south to north wedge formation.

content.detailedDescription:
We were heading north along the highway, and along the highway there is a lake, like river about a mile or half a mile wide on the left side, and on the right side of the high way is like mountain like rocks.  so we notice north of us just on the other shoreline across the lake, there was this light flashing above the treetops, at first we thought it was one of those radio towers that show above the trees.  but as we caught up to it where it was hover we noticed it was like moving up and down, going back and forth from one area to another, and it was flashing like orange, red, green, and there was like lights ejecting and hovering around it then disappearing.  we stopped to record it, and my sister was like "oh maybe it's a helicopter" but obviously the short distance we'd hear a helicopter.  this thing was silent.  for about a minute we recorded it, then it took off, within 2 seconds it was a mile up the river.  so we were driving along and we caught up to it again.  we didn't stop this time, but it started following and going along with us.  then again it zoomed about a mile and a half up that river, same thing within two seconds.  we caught up to it again, but this time as we caught up to it, there was these read lights like emerging from the bottom of it, and all of a sudden it was gone!  i don't know what happened but personally i think it landed, the others figured it just disappeared.  i don't claim to know what i saw was a alien craft, but i do know it was an unidentified flying object, and i got some advice from a friend to suggested i submit the video on here maybe someone might have answer, or seen something like it.  i don't know.

the video was kind of blurry, for some reason my camera wouldnt have the auto focus like it usually does.  but i tried changing the hues, and saturation, just messing around with it to see it in a different light, and i noticed at 29-20 seconds you can see it gives off some kind of light... i don't know i would like some feedback, or someone to just tell me what it looks like.  k thanks so much.
content.summary: It was spiderlike, or maybe different parts of it, but it had like lights ejecting from or around it

content.detailedDescription: Very bright pulsating light first observed at 45 degrees almost directly west. object would go into a stationary hover, list from side to side a distance double it's light brightness. it would then ascend or descend, hover then continue on a path west. i personally watched it for 5 mins before going inside and getting my room-mate and landlord to witness it with me. after i came back in from getting them there was now a vibrant green beam poking out of it's 7 o'clock position. the object was star sized compared to my distance the beam coming out made the object the circumference of a penny. it continued on with the actions and no pattern was observed with it's movement. after it had gone behind the tree line you could still see the light and it's movement through the trees.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object projecting a beam watched travelling west towards the city

content.detailedDescription:
Two bright yellow lights/objects stationary first then making directional changes.

the 2 lights were still in the night sky.  they blended in with the clear night starry night sky. at first i thought they were airplanes but they started moving in an odd pattern. the objects appeared to have blinking white lights without a set pattern.  the first object moved straight to the right horizontally just below the second object. then it went straight up (horizontal) to meet up with second object without touching it.  it then went on a 45 degree angle to the left of the second object and it disappeared.  the second object went to the right in a horizontal line and then disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two bright yellow lights/objects stationary first then making directional changes

content.detailedDescription:
On sunday, march 29, 2015, at approximately 11:45 pm, my wife and i had just turned off our reading lamp in the bedroom and were ready for sleep.  in the darkened room i noticed a single flash of light through a window shade in the corner of the room; the shades were pulled down.  i didn’t give it much thought.  we live at the end of a cul-de-sac and when vehicles make the circle at night the rooms of our house are lit by the headlights.  this was not like that but i didn’t recognize it as unusual at the time.  maybe a minute after the first flash i saw a second one.  i did notice that the pattern of light on the shade was more of a spotlight, not a flood light pattern.  it made a light on the shade about the size of a small coffee saucer.  i still was not moved to check it out.  after another minute or so there was another flash.  i asked my wife who was in bed and had had her eyes closed during the earlier flashes if she saw the last flash of light.  she did see that one.  now i was moved to see what might be going on outside.  i arose from bed and opened the window shade at the front corner of the house where the flashes had occurred.  while looking through the window into the dark yard in the direction that it appeared the flashes were coming from, i was surprised by a bright flash of intense white light that appeared to come from something about 10-15 feet from where i was standing.  it appeared to be near or just beyond the end of the front porch.  the diameter of the flash appeared to be the same size as a 1”-2” circle held at the end of my outstretched arm.  i was able to discern what looked like a very bright zig-zag line, brighter than the rest of the light, like a light bulb filament, in the center of the flash.  the flash lasted only a moment.  it was not the kind of flash we’ve all seen from camera flash units that fill your field of view with very bright light that then temporarily blind you.  even though very bright it did not blind me or result in me seeing spots of light in my vision.  i looked intently to try to see what had made the light but nothing was visible.  i put down the shade and got into bed.  (my wife says i went outside to check it out but i have no recollection of that.)  my wife and i considered that someone was playing with a drone but our house is surrounded by a fairly dense stand of trees and shrubs and the yard has a quite dense tree canopy that would present a challenge, i presume, for most drone operators.  there was no obvious sound associated with the flashing lights.  i turned off the night lamp and we went to sleep.
the next morning i was struck by my seeming lack of curiosity the night before about the final flash that occurred so close to me.  why was i able to so easily go to sleep so soon after the incident?  also the discrepancy in our observations about whether i went outside to check it out or not.  and lastly, our trusty dachshund, which sleeps in our bedroom and is very sensitive to outside sounds, did not rouse.  if someone had been playing with flashlights outside, he would have heard it.
we checked with the next door neighbor on march 31, 2014.  she had not seen nor heard anything on march 29.  however, the next neighbor over did notice one flash of light on her bedroom curtain some night earlier but couldn’t be sure of the date.  she just thought it had happened some time in the preceding week.
content.summary: Observed flashing light on bedroom blinds, then observed single flash of light approx 15 ft from window.

content.detailedDescription: What if you actually encountered something,would you go to the government, or keep it secret? can anyone actually be trusted?
content.summary: i am sorry but i just want to know what the implications of a normal civilian keeping something big from the government secret are? (in the eyes of the law) can the government intervene? would appreciate some facts/loopholes cheers

content.detailedDescription: I was in worcester. i was walking through boynton street. when i saw a glowing oval shaped object. i was confused at first, then i found it was really blue sky with a good vision.( look at the photos). speed was more than a normal aeroplane (guess).There was no sound. i took a video it just disappeared. the  i crossed institute road and found a similar object but this time its glowing and dimming. i took a couple of photos and again took a video. it disappeared.
content.summary: A glowing light was seen two times with 15 minutes in two different direction.

content.detailedDescription: I was shooting , starting from my brother 's bedroom window , when i observed an aircraft to enlarge the image noticed the presence of this object in the following section i felt a huge euphoria with the possibility of another object near the plane , as i can not say about what it is , i decided to send you the files to your analize , excuse my english poorly.
content.summary: I was shooting noticed an aircraft decides to shoot to enlarge visualized the presence of this object.
content.locationName: Viana do Castelo, Viana do Castelo District

content.detailedDescription:
Shortly after midnight of march 30th, 2015, (early monday morning) at 12:39 a.M., i noticed a brilliant green object descend in about a second of time from an angle of about 80° in the night sky.  it appeared to be similar to a meteor, we know that this is not possible under 12 miles altitude.  this was seen through our living room window.   the direction was 333° or roughly nnw.  the object appeared at about 17° height from the horizon, and when it had descended to 12° it hived off at least one smaller object that continued in the same direction as the main larger craft.

they would likely have entered blue springs lake at about 343°.  at approximately 1 mile distance, and covering a descent of 834 feet in about a second before vanishing beyond the trees, the objects would have been travelling at a rate of approximately 569 mph.

these craft seem to have just become visible at the time that i saw them.  if they would have been visible longer, i would seem from their trajectory.  there is an upper group of windows higher in the great room as large as the one from which the craft was observed.  this leads me to believe that the larger craft appeared, or materialized just before entering the area of the lake.  one can only speculate as to the mechanism of travel.  however the objects have entered once again in nearly the same area as the three previous craft from may 1, september 12, and october 15, 2014.

the odds of four “meteor” like objects descending ablaze in the same vicinity within yards of each other is 1,217,853.9 x 10256 to one.  the following seem to be the summarizing points:
•	the plunging craft seem to have been traveling at a great speed due to the ionization.
•	the objects are only visible for about a second or two.
•	these craft materialize at approximately 2500 feet altitude.
•	on two of the occasions, the meteor like object has “hived off” another object.
•	previous objects were brilliant yellow or whitish in color.  this was brilliant green, suggesting that it is made from different alloys.
•	the craft head to nearly precisely the same location each time.
•	interestingly, the star vega is nearby in each of the occurances.
content.summary: Brillian green streak

content.detailedDescription:
As described by many locals,  the ufo was first seen south east, and far above sugarloaf mountain.  the ufo after hovering for quite some time,  then descended and moved north west then hovering over a major grocery store (atholville).   

video footage is available 

there were many ...Clearly above 500 people who would have also witnessed this event due to it proximity to a populated,  busy area.  

people are coming forward over facebook.

video footage
[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]
content.summary: Ufo over urban area in the morning,  observed by many locals, it got closer

content.detailedDescription: A few weeks ago i was returning from denver and stopped at my favorite camping site, lake mcconaughy. i took many photos of the lake, the beach and the blue sky. i took a photo of the sun and my camera captured this anamoly in the picture. it appears to be behind the sun.
content.summary: Photo of the sun and captured amazing object

content.detailedDescription:
It was 2:00am and my wife and i were turning off the lights to go to bed when she noticed from our dining room window bright lights coming from the east and asked me to come and look, so i did.  we didn't think it looked like low flying plane or helicopter so we went outside to watch it. when we got outside it was obvious that it was something odd because it was very large and made absolutely no sound at all, totally silent. my wife ran inside and grabbed our binoculars and as soon as she looked at it through them she handed them to me and said "that's not an airplane!"  we watched the aircraft for approximately 3-4 minutes until it was out of sight.  i have attached an illustration defining the light arrangement. all lights were white except 2 red blinking lights.  i estimate the craft's altitude was approximately 2000-3000 feet and traveling approximately 100-200 knots.
we have spotted other strange aircraft in our area over the past 3 years but only a couple were extremely unusual.  however, usually after we notice something strange like this within the next day or two several blackhawk helicopters will be seen patrolling the area.  note: we are not close to any military bases or large airports but frequent sightings of unusual or unexplainable aircraft is not uncommon in our area. this is a rural area and mostly occupied by farmers and old order amish and he only thing close is a coal mine. however, about 30-40 years ago much of this area was strip-mined. in august 2012 i reported my 1st encounter to mufon and because it was such a life-changing experience for me, my wife and i continually watch the skies.  i am a disabled veteran and spend most of my time at home and even though 3 years have passed since my 1st encounter i cannot sleep more than 3-4 hours per night.  i never go to bed until 1 or 2 am and get up around 4:30-5:00. i am still struggling over it and finding that 1st experience very difficult to process.  there's more that i would like to talk about but i won't because nobody would believe me, (not even you !) life is very stressful knowing what you know but fearing to disclose it to anyone.  thank you for your time.

kind regards,
[witness name removed/dr/cms]
content.summary: Object travelling slow altitude 2000-3000 ft. very large, completely silent.

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed an unusual aeronautical phenomena. star gazing, while facing the west, directly above me moving from south to north was a bright glowing object with about the brightness of jupiter in the night sky. it dimmed then brightened again and faded away as it moved north. seconds behind it were two of the same objects side by side. they behaved in the same way. whatever it was it was not natural and was flying in formation.
content.summary: Three round circular objects observed in western sky moving south to north.

content.detailedDescription: In price chopper parking lot noticed street lights getting brighter n beams then started raining only half of truck and i got scared and left
content.summary: Uck was getting wet so i took pictures n u can see creatures looking at my windows

content.detailedDescription: I was relaxing and the disc actally crashed in my backyard i thought at first that it was a new ship being tested but there was no sound and it was at a trenmendos speed after that the millatary came and told me to not tell anyone
content.summary: It was like a disc

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight i was working in silerton tn very clear sky.  it was approaching daylight soon as i was wrapping up the nights job. something caught my eye from the nw.  a shooting star.. so instantly i looked to that direction and watch the meteor break up into pieces this kne glowed bright green and had tons of debris coming off of it. it fizzled out and fell below the tree line and out of sight.  pretty neat i thought haven't seen to many of those in my life.  i looked down for a moment to place the gear shift in drive and as soon as i focused my sight on the road.  a orb of light shot straight up from behind the tree line exactly where the meteor had fizzled out at.  initially i thought perhaps it wasn't over but immediately recognized this object was going straight up in the air. these events happened extrely somountaniosly "bang" "bang" if you will. this object however continued up and up until it was abundantly clear this was not debris. it had a strange spiral like wobble and i cannot begin to explain the speed this shot up in the air at.  as it climbed it remained the same color. suddenly without slowing down it came to a hover and it illuminated to an extremely bright hyper blue color its light was actually reflecting off my vehicles hood. it then at a rapid speed disappeared behind the tree line and out of sight for the moment.  

i turned left  onto  fire tower rd completed my deliveries on this road turned back north on silerton rd and the object was there again in the distance my distance cculation is just that is say perhaps a mile  from position to the direct west. it appeared to be moving how fast i could not judge i couldn't tell at the moment of it was moving towards me or away from me. knowing i had a different encounter on this same road a few months ago i felt more comfortable with or and dos not panic i chose to keep my eye on but continue my delivery route. in my rear view mirror i kept it in sight the object moved west to east then moved north directly behind me but quite a good distance between us.  at this point had to turn around as i turned around i lost sight of the object due to heavy tree cover.   i came to the spot again where i had initially spotted the object i stopped my  vehicle and looked in each direction and could not spot it.  i started to roll up my driver window and noticed my radio was complete static. having a nervous feeling i decided to just go home. as soon as i shifted to drive the object illuminated again the same hyper blue white color this time it didn't climb up it was hovering the whole time in the dark. it appeared to be following me for at least 25-30 mins and sitting there as i sat there. it lit up and flew to the south east at an amazing but steady speed at least 3x as fast as typical aircraft in the sky.  roughly 15 seconds later my radio came back to life i had not moved from that spot.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Watched some type of craft? launch into the air from behind trees hover illuminate the takeoff

content.detailedDescription:
This isnt the first time, i have reason to believe they might have a reason or something is bring them to the east coast of australia, ive sighted 3 or 4 now, all of different behaviour, ive seen a light hover then shoot down over the horizan of the ocean then an explosion of light following, another time there was just a huge, silver ball in the sky which appeared bigger than the moon. just hovered then vanished, that was not t he end, in the same spot a few weeks later a huge light hovered in the same area, huge as hell.
then tonight, i was called outside to try make sense of a huge cloud formation, the clouds apeared to be blowing around like crazy as huge lights, bigger than any spotlight ive ever seen, heaps of lights spinning with each other appearing to throw the clouds around, no noice nor could i see the object dispersing this light, many people saw it, no one can explain. this has happened far too often to me to not belive, too many accounts of the same thing, id like to know whats up. i believe
content.summary: Lights peaking out of the clouds, everywhere, huge.

content.detailedDescription: Bright object that looked like a star until i saw it moving and when i took out the camera to record, it disappeared.
content.summary: Saw bright slow moving object almost looked like a star

content.detailedDescription: Hi i am going to tell a story that is all real and is happening to me now .And has been going on since i was a kid.I have been seeing these things all my life,but never really knew what they were,i have seen many ufos but not what you see or hear about on tv or other stuff that people go on about.These are aliens that know one has ever seen or knows about no one on this planet knows anything i must be the only one on this planet.That knows all about them.So here goes okay alien made contact with me in 2012 i am out side a lot in my backyard it was a saturday moreing about 1:25 am when these things started to a pear be for me in the sky and it was cloudy and raining lightly,these lights started coming out of the clouds and it was not one hundreds of them keeped coming out and they were flashing lights at me i fort i was seening things at first.But when they started to come right down over the tree tops.And they were showing them self to me,i cloud not believe what i was seeing,then while that was happening some of them were flying right over on top of my head,this went on for about one hour.Then this big light came out of this cloud and came straight down to me i had to duck i fort it was going to hit me,so when i got back up again i was like inside this thing it was like mist or like a cloud this thing was so big i mean big about 200ftlong and it was very wide about 50ft.And when this thing came down it went straight through me it was invisible but i could see it so i turned around to look at this thing and i was so scared.This thing was some sort of living thing.And so i said hello and this thing just look at me then it flashed its lights at me and went back to that cloud that is lit up in the sky and that cloud is still here but that not all their is this white cloud and there is a blue cloud,witch is to i seen that come in form space.Anywhy this is all real,and they keep coming over all the time and i don't know why i can see them when they are invisible and they are watching me and i don't know why but the good news is i have got it all o video.I have over 2500 videos of them.They become visible to me i am on google and on youtube i want the world to know what is really going.I see them all the time even seen them today and see them evry where i.Even on tv that nothing to do with ufos or anything to with show that i am watching.I know this sounds all crazy.But the best but is i even have video of the alien that i met and still keeps coming to see me and i wave to them and they flash there lights at me i can see there base from my backyard.And i know where they hide.So got lots more stuff i can you about and you would be shocked if you knew the things they have shown me yes they show me every thing that i still find hard to believe.Still cant get over what has happened to me and is still going on believe it or not i can tell a lot of things know one knowns more than me here on this planet
content.summary: Invisible aliens make them self visible know one knows about these aliens .I know where they are.Still here wont leave me alone they keep follow me every where i go they have a base here that know one knows anything about they are not what people have bee

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up to a short loud cracking sound. i opened my eyes and seen a orange red glow kinda like fire on my wall thinking it was the tv i 
grabbed my remote to turn tv off turned over and seen tv was off and the glow was coming from out side. i just thought maybe it was lights from an ambulance or cop car but remembered there is no way it could be that because the whole back of my house is blocked by other buildings. then i started thinking maybe the apartments behind my house were on fire. i sleep with my window open and i have a real good sense of smell i didn't smell smoke i got scared turned back over pulled the sheet over my head i could still see the glowing on my wall threw the sheets. i closed my eyes and would open them over and over until i fell back to sleep. i slept for some time and woke up and went to the kitchen and my nephew was in there i told him i think i was seeing things and told him every thing he then said he seen a flash of light as well as his friend. they didn't see a glow they seen flash of light. the next morning i was telling me girls about it they said i was dreaming. maybe i was dreaming maybe not have you ever heard of anything like this.
content.summary: N/a

content.detailedDescription:
At about 11:20 pm i decided to take my bed clothes outside to shake out the pet hair. after doing so, i took a perfunctory glance at the stars and partial moon, which was a bit to the sw. for some reason i thought to myself that i should take another look at the sky and appreciate it a moment. 
i did so, and then noticed by the side of my eye an object slowly flying by. my first thought was that it was so quiet, because usually if a plane flies overhead i can hear it all too well. i also noticed that it had three pale yellow, cigar-shapes running parallel to each other moving in formation as it flew west. sort of like: /// i thought it was strange because except for the pale yellow coloring, there were no other lights, but still i thought maybe it was a plane. as i thought that, the middle cigar shape moved out of formation and then a second later back into formation. 
so, then i thought maybe it wasn't one solid object at all, maybe three small, pale, planes flying in formation for some reason. but the feeling i got was eerie, so i just went inside. that's when i realized that it just didn't look like a plane(s); no blinking red or white lights, no apparent wings, no sound. i have 20/20 vision and there was a bit of a moon out so, i saw it pretty well. it was just odd.
i'd like to know what it was i saw. maybe it was something ordinary like a plane(s), just not one i'd ever seen before. i wish i knew.
content.summary: Three cylindrical shaped objects in formation slowly, silently moving west

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing outside of my house talking to my neighbor.  she was facing me with her back to the west.  i noticed a bright light in the path of where the airplanes fly into our area and saw a bright white light, no other colors, proceeding from southwest to northwest along the pacific ocean.  at first i thought it was an airplane, but as i watched it it proceeded slowly like an airplane but within a second it shot off like a bullet from a pistol and went from the speed of an airplane to lightning speed then blinked out and disappeared. 

immediately after that, 
an airplane appeared within the same flight path coming from the northwest to the southwest.  

the first object that i saw was obviously not an airplane, as i see them everyday and it caught my full attention because it darted away so quickly.  i looked at my friend and said "that was weird" and told her i might have just seen a ufo.  she turned around, but it was gone.
content.summary: I was out side of my house and in the sky above i saw a light, bright white, no other colors present and it was perceeding s.W to s.E and at first it was slow then sped up at lightning speed and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: At 920pm on the 22nd of march 2015 i was looking at the stars from my moutain home, at 5000 ft., when i saw a narrow beam of white light.  i followed it with my eys to its sorce and saw that it was comming from a object that was blinking red with other faint colors. this beam of white was lazer like and looked like a thread comming from the scorce that must of been at lest 100 miles from me. what realy was weird was the fact this light beam was perfectly still, did not flicker, wobel and for a minute did not move. but when it did move, it moved in a perfet parale motion to its first position. the thing that has me in question is that i have never heard of a white light lazer? and being so far away i would expect it wobel and or flicker?
content.summary: Like a pulsar star,

content.detailedDescription: We were driving around in washington state and noticed something bright in the sky. my cousin said to keep an eye out because it was a clear night which was kinda unusual for him to say. we arrived at my house around 9 and  still noticed the object in the sky and it was getting brighter. i ran in and got my wife to come look at it with us. it hovered and moved around / wobbled there for almost an hour. we looked at it through binoculars and took pictures with my phone and camera . the photo posted is from my phone camera standing in front of my house. the object itself looked spherical in shape with spikes coming out like the new years star dropped in time square. it was so bright it was visible though binoculars and the picture confirms what i saw through them. we have no idea what this was. never seen anything like it in my life. we had four witnesses. myself, my wife and two cousins. in the video the object is in he middle left. the other light is a street lamp.
content.summary: Hovered for about an hour then slowly faded away

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out garbage at work. i noticed something moving in the sky so i looked up to see if it was a shooting star or an airplane. i at first thought it was a chinese lantern but it wasn't. the object stayed in a continuous straight line and changed from a bright white/yellow to a gold then on to a red. when it turned red it started to disappear into thin air pretty much. at first i didn't understand what i had just seen and then i ruled out it being a shooting star due to the slow movement of it. i ruled out a chinese lantern because they go up in the air usually and are not that bright. so the only explanation could have been was a ufo. after it turned red, going into the same continuous line, it blinked a couple of times then just disappeared.
content.summary: Started at yellow changed to gold then to orange steady ball moving
